name: loyalty-platform-backend
description: Backend API for loyalty program platform with wallet integration

scripts.verify-icons: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const iconsPath = path.join(__dirname, 'uploads', 'icons', 'stamps'); const files = ['manifest.json', 'coffee-filled.svg', 'gift-filled.svg', 'previews/coffee-preview.png', 'previews/gift-preview.png']; const missing = files.filter(f => !fs.existsSync(path.join(iconsPath, f))); if (missing.length > 0) { console.error('❌ Missing files:', missing); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ All icon files present'); process.exit(0); }"
